entries.journal_entry_description: Slice the supply terminal to provide improved componenets for your faction
entries.task01_journal_entry_description: Slice as many of the ten security layers as you can.
entries.task02_journal_entry_description: You've sliced all of the supply terminals security layers
entries.task02_journal_entry_title: You've sliced all of the ten security layers
entries.task03_journal_entry_description: You have a window of three minuites before the terminal autmatically resets its security.
entries.task03_journal_entry_title: You have three minutes to slice the terminal
entries.task04_message_box_text: The time available to slice the terminal has run out. If you wish to try again you will have to start over.
entries.task05_journal_entry_description: The time expired and the terminals security was reset.
